data.eml:eml: A new fossil Saldidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Leptopodomorpha) from the Early Cretaceous in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Weiting, Song, Jingjing, Yao, Yunzhi, Ren, Dong (2012): A new fossil Saldidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Leptopodomorpha) from the Early Cretaceous in China. Zootaxa 3273: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280827
